subject: Polo
Horse Racing
Horses
Veterinary Medicine
lead_paragraph: The veterinarian who injected 21 elite polo horses with a supplement before a championship match in Florida and then watched them die says the grief is unbearable. The Argentine veterinarian Felix Crespo said he injected the horses a week ago with a supplement provided to him by the Venezuelan-owned team’s veterinarian in Florida. Crespo said that he did not know if he would ever be the same again.
